fields.label: translate:: Alternatives - first alternative is the correct one.
translate:: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: translate:: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

fields.label: translate:: Feedback for defined score range
translate:: Auto continue
fields.description: translate:: Automatically go to next question when alternative is selected

fields.label: translate:: Pass percentage
fields.description: translate:: Percentage of Total score required for passing the quiz.

fields.label: translate:: Label for the "Show solution" button
translate:: Title for the show solution view
translate:: Readspeaker text for correct answer
translate:: Readspeaker text for incorrect answer
translate:: Label for the "mute" button, to disable feedback sound
translate:: Slide number text
fields.description: translate:: Announces current slide and total number of slides, variables are :num and :total

fields.label: translate:: Textual representation of the score bar for those using a readspeaker
fields.default: translate:: You got :num out of :total points

fields.label: translate:: Label for the question number in the solution list
fields.description: translate:: Announces current question index in solution list, variables are :num

fields.label: translate:: Assistive technology description for "Show Solution" button
fields.default: translate:: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.

fields.label: translate:: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
fields.default: translate:: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
